silhouette.shapes
Class BoxShape

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--silhouette.constraints.constrainedObject
        |
        +--silhouette.shapes.AbstractSilShape
              |
              +--silhouette.shapes.BoxShape
All Implemented Interfaces:
SilShape
Direct Known Subclasses:
CompositeShape, EllipseShape, ImageShape, RectangleShape, TextShape
public abstract class BoxShape
extends AbstractSilShape

The base class for rectangular shapes, like roundtangles, ellipses, rectangles, composite objects and text objects. It adds the following properties to a Silhouette Shape:

  1. left: The left side of the object.
  2. top: The top side of the object.
  3. width: The width of the object.
  4. height: The height of the object.
